message: You're welcome! I'm glad it was helpful. I am not sure if you already know about this, but there is a nice extension for Chrome browsers called PS Utilities that is capable of giving you the record and field names of values on PeopleSoft pages. With this utility, you can simply put your mouse over a value on the page and it will tell you the corresponding record and field. This is much easier to do versus getting this information through app designer.
